mdRecord.dcterms:title: East View of Mount Vernon Mansion.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cabinet card of the east front of the Mansion from the east lawn. Note the depression in the lawn that creates a pathway from the center of the piazza between the two small trees up to where the photographer stands leading to the deer park walk. The following text is printed directly onto the reverse of the cardboard mount: East View of Mount Vernon Mansion. Copyrighted by Luke C. Dillon, Photographer to Mount Vernon, Office at Pullman's Gallery, 935 Penn. Avenue, Washington, D.C.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: p Mansion exterior
p piazza
p east front
p balustrade
